biotools.summary:
Estimating population history from genetic data.

Estimate population history parameters from site pattern frequencies.

Legofit is a computer package that uses counts of nucleotide site patterns to estimate the history of population size, subdivision, and gene flow.

bioschemas.name: Legofit
